pullRequest.title: Add ping endpoint handler
pullRequest.bodyText: Previously, node pings in HeartbeatFailureDetector would return a 404 to pings because no endpoint was configured to handle HEAD requests to the root path. Now they return empty HTTP OK responses.

nodes.bodyText: Curious - is that possible that HeartbeatFailureDetector pings some already existing, known url? Instead of adding a fake one?

commit.message:
Add status endpoint for HTTP HEAD requests

Previously, node pings in HeartbeatFailureDetector would go to the
root path and return 404 from workers because no endpoint was mapped
to handle them. Now the failure detector points to /v1/status
and receives empty HTTP OK responses instead.
